bitmusic.network.api

Interface ApiHmi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApiHmiImpl

    public interface ApiHmi
    Interface given to HMI to interact with the Network.

    • Method Detail

      • addComment

        void addComment(Song song,
              Comment comment)
                throws NetworkException
        Send a comment about a song to a distant user.
        Parameters:
        song - song concerned
        comment - the new comment to add
        Throws:
        NetworkException - thrown when the user doesn't exist

      • logOut

        void logOut(java.lang.String userId)
            throws NetworkException
        Notify every distant user that we are logging out.
        Parameters:
        userId - local user ID
        Throws:
        NetworkException - thrown when the logging out fails

      • getUser

        void getUser(java.lang.String operator,
           java.lang.String userId,
           java.lang.String researchId)
             throws NetworkException
        Get the profile of a distant user.
        Parameters:
        operator - local user ID who is requesting for the song
        userId - id of the user whose profile we want.
        researchId - id of the research
        Throws:
        NetworkException - thrown when the get fail

      • getSongFile

        void getSongFile(java.lang.String operator,
               java.lang.String userId,
               java.lang.String songId,
               boolean paramTemporary)
                 throws NetworkException
        Ask for a remote song file.
        Parameters:
        operator - local user ID who is requesting the song
        userId - distant user ID that owns the song
        songId - distant song ID that you want retrieve
        paramTemporary - will the song be downloaded as temporary
        Throws:
        NetworkException - thrown when the get fail

      • rateSong

        void rateSong(Song paramSong,
            java.lang.String paramUserId)
              throws NetworkException
        Rate a distant song.
        Parameters:
        paramSong - The song to rate
        paramUserId - ID of the user that rates the song
        Throws:
        NetworkException - thrown when the get fail

      • shutdownExecutorService

        void shutdownExecutorService()
        Shutdown the Executor service (thread pool) when program exits.

      • getAllUserId

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllUserId()
        Returns:
        The list of User who are connected

      • notifyNewConnection

        void notifyNewConnection(User user)
                         throws NetworkException
        Notify connection of a user and pass his profile to broadcast it.
        Parameters:
        user - the complete user who just connected
        Throws:
        NetworkException - throws an exception when the given user isn't registered in the directory
